mapper.select: SELECT a.rn, a.userId, a.contents, a.regDate FROM ( SELECT a.rn, a.userId, a.contents, a.regDate FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, USER_ID userId, CONTENTS contents, REGDATE regDate FROM IDEA_MINI_BOARD) a WHERE rn <= 3 * #{page}) a WHERE rn > 3 * (#{[page]} - 1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IDEA_MINI_BOARD (MIN_SEQ, USER_ID, CONTENTS, REGDATE)VALUES (#{minSeq},#{userId},#{contents},#{regDate})
